thread.title: Cloudy with afternoon rain, snowfalls expected in the mountains - News
thread.title_full: Cloudy with afternoon rain, snowfalls expected in the mountains - News

title: Cloudy with afternoon rain, snowfalls expected in the mountains - News
text:
On Saturday, the lowest temperatures in Bulgaria will be between minus 4 and 1°C; in Sofia - about minus 1°C. During the day, cloudiness over the country will increase from the west and afternoon rainfalls are expected. The weather will be mostly sunny in the eastern regions of Bulgaria. The highest temperatures will be between 3° and 8°C; in the southwestern regions - up to 11°C. The temperature in the capital will be around 4°C.
In the mountains, the cloudiness will be significant. In the afternoon, rainfalls will start in the western massifs, as above 1600 m the precipitation will be of snow. With the decline in temperature, the rain-snow boundary will decrease. The highest temperature at an altitude of 1200 m will be 4°C; at 2000 meters - around minus 2°C.
Sunny weather will prevail at the Black Sea coast. In the afternoon, cloudiness will begin to increase and during the night on Sunday, rainfalls are possible in some places. The highest temperatures will be 7-9°C. Sea water temperature is 10-12°C.
